name: @rharel/webext-private-bookmarks
description: WebExtension that enables a password-protected bookmark folder.

scripts.bundle-init: rm -rf build && mkdir build && cp -r source/_locales source/manifest.json source/icons/main/private-bookmarks-*.png build
scripts.bundle: npm run bundle-init && parcel build source/options_ui/options_page.html source/main_ui/main_page.html source/core/background.ts --dist-dir build --no-optimize
scripts.bundle-dev: npm run bundle-init && parcel watch source/options_ui/options_page.html source/main_ui/main_page.html source/core/background.ts --dist-dir build
scripts.build: npm run bundle && web-ext lint && web-ext build

author: Raoul Harel
